name: Geometric Tempo
description:
Information:

- The game can be played with just a mouse

- You fire at a regular interval

- If the border is white, you will shield; if it is orange, you will fire

- You move backwards from where you are looking each time you fire

- Survive through as many waves as possible to get points

Coming soon:

A how-to-play section

Modifications to the point system

Modifications to the spawning system

Clarity changes

A countdown till next fire
